page.title: 12Employers
page.content: Next to the school is the biggest firm in Ashton. The name of the firm is Farralls Transport. It started 27 years ago by Mr.E.Farrall. They have a fleet of 39 big trucks,16 articulated lorries 8 flat ,2 box vans ,2 skeleton and 11 laurlliner.The maximum load a truck can carry is 32 tons.The furthest they travel is anywhere in the British Isles except Ireland, the longest journey one of the trucks has made is to Wick.Maximum speed of a truck is 70 m.p.h. 24 men work at the yard and they include a mechanic.A new truck is about Â£25,000 and the road tax is Â£2,450. The trucks carry DIY goods, foods, paper goods, oil and even barrels of ginger beer.
